action_device.description: The device from which the action was performed.

action_canvas_component_name.description: The name of the canvas component where the action occurred.

action_carousel_card_id.description: The ID of the carousel card where the action occurred.

action_carousel_card_name.description: The name of the carousel card where the action occurred.

action_destination.description: The destination where the action was taken.

action_reaction.description: The user reaction associated with the action.

action_target_id.description: The ID of the target where the action took place.

action_video_sound.description: The sound setting for the video where the action occurred.

action_video_type.description: The type of video where the action occurred.
